Dear Prof. Goodwin

I just posted a message with make error message under mandrake 10.0 I
believe that it was consequence of the library Numeric was chanched to
numarray and it was not installed before neither. Also the code in
cantera source include Numeric insteady of numarray. Is it? But I
tried again to compile, changing the code pycantera.cpp in order to
include numarray but other message error appears like below. Could ou
help me?

Tank you in advance for your attention

Wladimyr


a piece of make stdout:
========================================
